creator: se_shailesh@yahoo.co.in
text:
I downloaded Apache-Tomcat-5.5.16 binary from Tomcat site & also set the 
environment variables:
PATH, CLASSPATH, TOMCAT_HOME, CATALINA_BASE, CATALINA_HOME, JAVA_HOME.
I am using JDK-1.4.

Yes, Tomcat 5.5.16 requires JDK-1.5 but for working with JDK-1.4 it provides a 
compatibility package. I downloaded it & copied it to the respective 
directories as instructed.
Problem is i am unable to startup the server.
There are no error reports also. It is simply not doing anything.

Previously, i was using Tomcat-4.1.30 which was working fine.
Can anyone sort it out pls.

First, it works out of the box for me.  So I'm closing this issue as WORKSFORME.

I suggest you take your question to the user mailing list.  Over there people
may try to help you figure out what's messed up with your installation.  I also
suggest you read http://tomcat.apache.org/faq/tomcatuser.html before posting there.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
